data.title: Top 15 Jewellery Brands in India That’ll Make You Shine
data.meta_description: Looking for elegant and sophisticated jewellery for your next big occasion? Check out our list of the best jewellery brands in India here!
data.text:
Indian women love their jewellery and like to customize various pieces as per the occasion. A piece of good-looking jewellery can instantly enhance your appearance and make you feel resplendent. Many brands in India produce top-quality jewellery that is adored by people all over the world. Whether you want to purchase a diamond-studded ring or just a plain gold chain for everyday use, you will find it all here. Gold jewellery is bought as a valuable lifetime investment, so you must buy the best quality products. We have listed down some of the top jewellery brands in India that are perfect for every occasion and have several jewellery pieces within different budgets.

Our Top Picks

How do we Choose the Best Jewellery Brands for You?

Indian women have an undying love for gold jewellery as it looks stunning and is a great investment that lasts for generations. While buying jewellery online can be a little overwhelming, we are here to help you do it with ease. Here are some basic factors that you can take care of when buying jewellery online.

Material

In India, you can buy jewellery made with gold, silver, platinum, alloy, etc. You will also get a huge variety in all these metals so you’re spoilt for choice.

Purity

The purest form of gold is 24k, and it isn’t mixed with any other metal. However, 22k, 14k, or 18k gold are better choices when it comes to jewellery as they are stronger and can be bought on a budget. Always ensure to check the metal purity before buying online to prevent any fraud later on. Also, ensure that the jewellery is Hallmark certified.

Designs

Today, most brands have a variety of designs, such as Meenakari, Kundan, Jadau, etc. You can also choose modern and minimalistic designs that are available in both luxury and artificial jewellery brands.

From the younger to the older generation, everyone is well aware of Tanishq and millions of people trust the brand due to its high-quality products and designs. When buying from Tanishq, you can be assured about the purity of gold, silver, and platinum as you’ll always get the best.

Things to Know Before Buying Gold Jewellery in India

Buying gold in India is a significant investment that must be done carefully. This is why, it is important to be aware of a few factors.

Purity of Gold

Higher the purity of gold, the more valuable it will be. Before you make a purchase, make sure you learn about its purity. In the Indian market, gold jewellery is typically sold in 18-karat, 22-karat, or 24-karat purity. Hence, check accordingly.

Hallmark

This is another important factor that plays a crucial role in choosing gold jewellery. Always look for a hallmark stamp which indicates the purity and authenticity of the gold.

Certification

If you are planning to buy gold as an investment, you should ask for a certification of authenticity from agencies like the Bureau of Indian Standards. It provides the guarantee of purity and authenticity which in return makes it easy to sell or exchange gold in future.

Other Factors

Other than the above-mentioned factors, pay attention to design, making charges, and the reputation of the seller to ensure you make the right decision.

Making Charges for Jewellery

Making charges of jewellery refer to the cost of the labour and the skills involved in its crafting. It also includes the additional cost associated with the design and production. In India, the making charges for jewellery are not fixed and can vary based on factors such as the intricacy of the design, the quantity of gold used, and the proficiency of the artisans.

While some jewellers may quote lower making charges, others may charge a premium amount for their experience and reputation. As making charges are an additional expense on top of the jewellery’s price, it is recommended to compare prices from different jewellers and ensure that you are paying a fair price for the jewellery.

Tips to Buy Jewellery Smartly

If you want to purchase jewellery wisely, here are some tips that you must keep in mind. This will help you make a purchase with care and consideration.

Set a Budget

This is the first and foremost step before you start shopping for jewellery. Considering how much you can afford, you must set a budget and stick to it. This will help you avoid spending more than you are willing to.

Do your research

To begin with your jewellery shopping, you must do your part of the research to ensure that you get your hands on the right product. Familiarise yourself with the type of jewellery, its quality, pricing, and styles. Also, look for reputable jewellers with good reviews and ratings to get an incredible purchasing experience.

Look for deals and discounts

For making a smart purchase, this is the most crucial tip to keep in mind. You must always look for deals and discounts before you go ahead and shop. During certain times of the year, some jewellers offer sales or promotions and are able to negotiate a lower price. This will help you get the best value for money for your purchase.

Inspect the jewellery

This is another tip that is generally neglected by most buyers. Before you finalise your purchase, inspect the jewellery for defects or damages. Look for the clasps, settings, and stones to ensure that it is in good condition.

Final Word

The right piece of jewellery can transform your look and make you feel even more beautiful than you already are. Since it can be a little tricky to buy jewellery online, we have compiled a list of the best jewellery brands in India so that you can make the purchase without any hassle. Our personal favourite brands are Tanishq, PC Jewellers, and Kalyan Jewellers. Feel free to explore the entire list to find something that truly resonates with your personality.
